SET(SOURCES regex_icl.cpp)

SET(HEADERS regex_icl.h)

ADD_LIBRARY(regex_icl STATIC ${SOURCES} ${HEADERS})

# dunno whether this works ...
set_property(TARGET regex_icl PROPERTY CXX_STANDARD 11)

SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(regex_icl
                      PROPERTIES
                      VERSION ${SO_VERSION})
